Item.method_code:
'handler For Part onAfterAdd And onAfterUpdate
Aras.Server.Core.Utilities. IsIdValid(Me.getID(), True)
Dim sqlQuery As String = "exec PE_RollupPart '" + CCO.Variables.InnDatabase.QuoteValue(Me.getID()) + "','Part'" Dim conn As Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorDatabase = CCO.Variables.InnDatabase Dim result As Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorDataSet = conn.ExecuteSelect(sqlQuery)
If (result.RowsNumber = 1) Me.removeProperty("cost") Me.removeProperty("weight") Me.removeProperty("cost_basis") Me.removeProperty("weight_basis") If (Not DBNull.Value.Equals(result("cost"))) Then Me.setProperty("cost", result("cost")) If (Not DBNull.Value.Equals(result("weight"))) Then Me.setProperty("weight", result("weight")) If (Not DBNull.Value.Equals(result("cost_basis"))) Then Me.setProperty("cost_basis", result("cost_basis")) If (Not DBNull.Value.Equals(result("weight_basis"))) Then Me.setProperty("weight_basis", result("weight_basis")) End If Me.setAction("") Return Me
Item.name: PE_RollupPart
